pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalised Additive Extreme Value Models // Methods for fitting various extreme value distributions with parameters of generalised additive model (GAM) form are provided. For details of distributions see Coles, S.G. (2001) doi:10.1007/978-1-4471-3675-0, GAMs see Wood, S.N. (2017) doi:10.1201/9781315370279, and the fitting approach see Wood, S.N., Pya, N. Safken, B. (2016) doi:10.1080/01621459.2016.1180986. Details of how evgam works and various examples are given in Youngman, B.D. (2022) doi:10.18637/jss.v103.i03.
